config.name: postgres-cdc-notifydb-with-pk-v3.0
config.plugin.name: pgoutput
config.slot.name: notifydb_slot
config.publication.name: notifydb_publication
config.table.include.list: public.api_client, public.application_properties, public.client_permissions, public.email_notification_apr_25, public.email_notification_arch_dec_24, public.email_notification_arch_feb_25, public.email_notification_arch_jan_25, public.email_notification_arch_old, public.email_notification_mar_25, public.email_notification_may_25, public.email_notification_old, public.locale_message, public.master_code, public.master_code_type, public.notification_template, public.notification_template_content, public.otp_configuration, public.otp_details, public.permission, public.proc_exception, public.sms_notification, public.sms_notification_apr_25, public.sms_notification_arch, public.sms_notification_arch_dec_24, public.sms_notification_arch_feb_25, public.sms_notification_arch_jan_25, public.sms_notification_arch_old, public.sms_notification_mar_25, public.sms_notification_may_25, public.sms_notification_old, public.web_request_log, public.web_request_log_01_apr, public.web_request_log_02_apr, public.web_request_log_03_apr, public.web_request_log_04_apr, public.web_request_log_05_apr, public.web_request_log_21_mar, public.web_request_log_22_mar, public.web_request_log_23_mar, public.web_request_log_24_mar, public.web_request_log_25_mar, public.web_request_log_26_mar, public.web_request_log_27_mar, public.web_request_log_28_mar, public.web_request_log_29_mar, public.web_request_log_30_mar, public.web_request_log_31_mar, public.web_request_log_old, public.pg_heartbeat
config.heartbeat.action.query: UPDATE public.pg_heartbeat SET last_update=now() WHERE id=0;
